name: Denim Group
description:
Denim Group is the leading secure software development firm, serving as a trusted advisor to customers on matters of software risk and security. 
The company builds software for the most security conscious while helping organizations assess and mitigate risk within their existing software. Denim Group’s flagship ThreadFix product accelerates the process of software vulnerability remediation, reflecting the company’s rich understanding of what it takes to fix application vulnerabilities faster.
